pluginstrument.author: John Parker
pluginstrument.description:
Modification of Jason Tatum's original Heading gauge Brian McMullan 20180327 Vacuum fail flag added Property for background off/on (default ON) Property for dimming overlay (default OFF) Property for Pilot (vac1) or co-pilot (vac2) (XP only) (default VAC1) Property for animated or snap fail flag (default ON)
XPlane 11.11 supports gyro drift
